alert.note: Alert for Northern Franklin; Northern Oxford (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 12:23PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Oxford and west central Franklin Counties through 100 PM EDT... At 1223 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Rangeley, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rangeley, Phillips, Weld, Dallas Plantation, Byron, Sandy River Plantation, Rangeley Plantation, Madrid, Adamstown and Richardsontown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
